item.title: DeepQuali: Determining Software Quality with AI
item.description: DeepQuali is an AI-powered “co-pilot” that helps developers quickly spot issues, anti-patterns, and improvement opportunities in software architecture beyond what traditional metrics reveal.

item.title: SonarQube with JaCoCo in multi-module Maven project
item.description: How to set up a SonarQube code analysis using the Sonar Maven Plugin including code coverage with the JaCoCo Maven plugin.

item.title: MaLTeSQuE / SANER 2018
item.description: Talks and workshops I attended of the 25th conference on Software Analysis, Evaluation and Reengineering (SANER).

item.title: "I know it when I see it": Perceptions of Code Quality (Part 2)
item.description: The first set of results from a research project into the perceptions of code quality.

item.title: "I know it when I see it" - Perceptions of Code Quality
item.description: Motivation and scope of a research project into the perceptions of code quality by different stakeholders
